name: custom_tab_stops
description: Clear all default tab stops, set custom stops at cols 4 and 9, tab through them
comment: CSI 3 g (clear all tabs), CUP col 5 → col 4, HTS set tab, CUP col 10 → col 9, HTS set tab, CUP home, print A at col 0, TAB → col 4, print B at col 4, TAB → col 9, print C at col 9; cursor at (0,10)
